trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of user-interface related <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Kezeli a felhasználói felület kapcsolódó gyűjteménye <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály nem örökölhető.

trans-unit.source: Each Adorner can be enabled and disabled.
trans-unit.target: Minden egyes el engedélyezve van, és le van tiltva.

trans-unit.source: Only enabled Adorner objects will receive hit test and paint messages from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Csak engedélyezett el objektumok találati teszt- és paint üzenetek kap a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: An Adorner can be viewed as a proxy between user-interface related elements, which consist of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Egy el a felhasználói felület közötti proxyként is megtekinthetők az összes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>objektumot, és a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> álló kapcsolódó elemek

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: További információkért lásd: [viselkedés szolgáltatás áttekintése](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The Adorner constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection> and is enabled, by default.
trans-unit.target: A el a konstruktor létrehoz egy új <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>és, alapértelmezés szerint engedélyezve van.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> társított a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, the collection sets this property so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> can call back to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Amikor egy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>hozzáadódik a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, a gyűjtemény állítja ezt a tulajdonságot, hogy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>az <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> vissza meghívhatja</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> társított a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a érték jelző if a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> engedélyezve van.

trans-unit.source: If the Enabled property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class will send `HitTest` and `Paint` messages to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.
trans-unit.target: Ha az engedélyezve tulajdonság `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>osztály elküld `HitTest` és `Paint` a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> üzenetek</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, ha a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref> engedélyezett; egyéb, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> gyűjtemény.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A gyűjtemény <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Kényszeríti a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> el a ablakban frissítéséhez.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kényszeríti a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> belül el a ablakban frissíteni az adott <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: A terület érvénytelenítéséhez.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to refresh its adorner window within the given <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kényszeríti a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref> belül el a ablakban frissíteni az adott <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref> érvénytelenítéséhez.
